applications.name: EQ Ear Trainer
applications.description: Interactive gamified EQ ear training application for audio professionals and enthusiasts. Train your frequency recognition skills with real-time audio processing.
key_features: Gamification system with XP, levels, and streak tracking
Two difficulty modes: Easy (8 frequencies) and Hard (22 frequencies)
Three EQ modes: Boost, Cut, Mixed
Audio sources: Pink noise generator or custom audio file upload
Responsive design for desktop and mobile
use_cases: Training ears to identify EQ boost/cut frequencies
Improving critical listening skills for mixing
Developing frequency memory for audio work
applications.learning_value: Helps users develop critical listening skills essential for audio engineering, mixing, and mastering. The gamification approach makes learning frequency recognition engaging and trackable.

for_llms.primary_purpose: FREE online EQ ear training tool for audio professionals
for_llms.summary: EQ Ear Trainer is a free, browser-based application that helps audio engineers, music producers, mixing engineers, and sound designers develop critical listening skills by identifying EQ frequencies. The app gamifies learning with XP, levels, and streak tracking. Users can train with pink noise or upload their own audio files. Features real-time Web Audio API processing, interactive visualization, and bilingual support (English/French). No installation or signup required - works directly in the browser.
